headline.main: Philip Glass, at Spoleto USA as Speaker and Spectator, Also Performs

headline.main: Granderson Calls for More Accountability for Umpires

headline.main: Velazquez Teams With Union Rags for Impressive Work

docs.snippet: John Velazquez made the journey from New York to Fair Hill in Elkton, Md., on Sunday morning to ride Union Rags for the first time. Union Rags was scheduled to put in his final work, ahead of Saturday's Belmont Stakes....

headline.main: How Kinect Spawned a Commercial Ecosystem

docs.snippet: Does progress flow from a corporate entity's offering a whiz-bang breakthrough embraced by the masses? Or does techno-thing success now depend on the company's acquiescing to the crowd's input? Which vision of an object's meaning wins? The Kinect ...
docs.abstract: Does progress flow from a corporate entity's offering a whiz-bang breakthrough embraced by the masses? Or does techno-thing success now depend on the company's acquiescing to the crowd's input? Which vision of an object's meaning wins? The Kinect does not neatly conform to either theory. But in this instance, maybe it's not about whose vision wins; maybe it's about the contest.
